item.description: This is an open meet up anyone can attend, if you are from the meet up group come see me DJ Dave and we can get you folks together. It's a great place to socialize, great fun, great patrons, and an even better spot for karaoke, if you like to sing, you will feel like a rock star when you take the stage. Powerful sound system, same as they use for live entertainment, lighting and club atmosphere. So come Rock the Sandbar!
item.name: Friday Night Karaoke @ The Sandbar
